meanings.definition: An abnormal curvature of the spine causing a hunchback appearance.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with kyphoses after noticing his hunched back.
meanings.sent2: Kyphoses can sometimes be treated with physical therapy and exercises.
meanings.sent3: Despite his kyphoses, he always stood tall and confident.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the world seemed to rest on his kyphoses, burdening him.
meanings.sent5: Her kyphoses made her resemble a question mark, always curious about the world.
